text: Copenhagen had regional rail *much* farther out into the suburbs, they run *much* more frequently, and parking at the stations appeared to be *free*. Also, there's a single pass for getting around. We need much better offerings from Septa for people who live out of the city.

The corral was moved by Streets during resurfacing last summer, and never re-installed.

So now, the rack is on the sidewalk (as pictured) but "bike-parking only" signage is still on the street keeping any cars from parking there legally (it's frequently police cars instead).
